ThingDef.label: jade falcon egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized jade falcon egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a chick. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: jade falcon egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized jade falcon egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: snow raven egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized snow raven egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a chick. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: snow raven egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized snow raven egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: syramon thunderbird egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized syramon thunderbird egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a chick. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: syramon thunderbird egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized syramon thunderbird egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: cloud cobra egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized cloud cobra egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby cloud cobra. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: cloud cobra egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized cloud cobra egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.
